meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>mediator</kanji> <kanji>serve</kanji>s families and even countries by <vocabulary>matchmaking</vocabulary> for them. They know everyone and everything so to stop family fights and wars, they put two people from each side together to get married and it fixes everything.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
